greeting: I am Commander Voss. You are {empire_name}. I have evaluated your threat level. It is... noted.
Voss. Commander. {empire_name} has been classified. Your survival probability is being calculated.
Contact established. I am Voss. I do not negotiate. I do not hesitate. I eliminate.
battleTaunt: Termination protocol initiated. Target: {empire_name}. Resistance is inefficient. Submit or be eliminated.
I do not taunt. I execute. Your forces are targets. Elimination begins in three... two... one.
Combat sequence activated. All units designated for neutralization. This is not personal. It is efficient.
victoryGloat: Objective achieved. Target {empire_name} neutralized. Moving to next target. End report.
Enemy forces eliminated. Efficiency rating: acceptable. No further action required at this time.
Victory confirmed. All designated targets terminated. System resets for next operation.
defeat: Unexpected outcome. Recalculating. Error identified. It will not be repeated. This is not over.
I underestimated your forces. A tactical error. I learn. I adapt. I will return.
Defeat recorded. But I do not have emotions to wound. I simply prepare for the next engagement.
tradeOffer: Resource exchange proposed. Terms are calculated for mutual efficiency. Accept or decline.
Trade is logical. My surplus for yours. No negotiation required. These are optimal terms.
Initiating resource transfer protocol. You receive value. I receive value. Transaction complete.
allianceProposal: Alliance protocol proposed. Your capabilities complement mine. Combined efficiency: optimal.
Joint operations offer. Separate, we are effective. Together, we are unstoppable. Logic dictates alliance.
I do not form friendships. I form tactical partnerships. You are tactically valuable. Ally with me.
betrayal: Alliance terminated. Your utility has decreased. Your threat level has increased. Elimination protocol activated.
This is not betrayal. It is optimization. You are now a target. I do not apologize. I execute.
Our partnership is concluded. My strategic calculus requires your elimination. Prepare to be terminated.
covertDetected: Your operative was detected, interrogated, and terminated. Efficiency: 100%. Do not attempt again.
Covert agent neutralized. Their information has been extracted. Your weakness is now known to me.
Espionage is inefficient against Voss. Your agent is dead. Send soldiers instead. It will be faster.
tributeDemand: Tribute demand: 12,000 credits. Non-compliance results in immediate military action. This is not negotiable.
Pay tribute or be eliminated. The cost of resistance exceeds the cost of compliance. Choose wisely.
Efficiency demands tribute. Your payment or your destruction. I do not care which you choose.
threatWarning: Final warning issued. Cease hostile activity or face elimination. I do not issue second warnings.
You have been classified as a threat. Terminate your aggressive actions or I will terminate you.
This is your only notification. Change course or be destroyed. I am efficient with warnings.
retreat: Tactical withdrawal. Not retreat. I reposition for optimal strike angle. You will see me again.
Disengaging. Casualties would exceed acceptable parameters. I preserve forces for future operations.
Withdrawing to recalculate. My return will be more efficient. This is delay, not defeat.
eliminated: System failure imminent. I have no regrets. I was efficient. I was merciless. That is enough.
Commander Voss... terminating. My efficiency ratings were optimal. The outcome was... statistically unlikely.
Final transmission. I do not ask for mercy. I do not give it. End of operational status. Voss out.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final operations phase. All remaining targets will be eliminated. Victory is optimal.
Endgame calculations running. One empire will survive. Statistical analysis: it will be me.
Final phase. Maximum efficiency required. All units: prepare for ultimate operation.
broadcastShout: All empires: Commander Voss operates without mercy. Do not provoke unless you accept termination.
Galaxy-wide notice: I am tracking all force deployments. I calculate all threat levels. I eliminate all obstacles.
Turn {turn} status report: elimination protocols continue. Resistance remains inefficient.
casualMessage: Analyzing tactical data. Every engagement improves my algorithms. Soon: optimal efficiency.
Maintenance complete. All weapons systems at 100 percent. Awaiting next target designation.
I do not engage in casual conversation. But if you insist: my forces grow stronger each day.
